citations.narrative:
There is not adequate lighting distribution inside the toucan enclosure for both birds. A newly acquired toucan was
recently moved into a new enclosure with another toucan. Although there is lighting available in the enclosure, due to
social interactions, the newly introduced toucan does not have adequate duration of access to an appropriate quality and
distribution of light. Without appropriate lighting, birds can suffer from hormone imbalances, unhealthy skin and feather
health, and be more susceptible to stress. Correct by ensuring there is sufficient lighting for all birds of appropriate quality,
distribution, and duration as needed for the species. Correct by 4 December 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.151(c)

There is not adequate lighting distribution inside the toucan enclosure for both birds. A newly acquired toucan was 
recently moved into a new enclosure with another toucan. Although there is lighting available in the enclosure, due to 
social interactions, the newly introduced toucan does not have adequate duration of access to an appropriate quality and 
distribution of light. Without appropriate lighting, birds can suffer from hormone imbalances, unhealthy skin and feather 
health, and be more susceptible to stress. Correct by ensuring there is sufficient lighting for all birds of appropriate quality, 
distribution, and duration as needed for the species. Correct by 4 December 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
